description: The BCS shall provide proportional braking pressure (0â€“3000 psi) based on pilot pedal deflection.
The BCS shall provide Antiskid protection to prevent wheel lock-up above 20 knots.
The BCS shall provide three selectable Auto-Brake deceleration levels: LO
The BCS shall inhibit braking during touchdown until 3 seconds after WoW or wheel speed > 50 kts.
The BCS shall perform continuous health monitoring and report faults via ARINC-429.
